mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS base_ym, cred_mrtg_nm, count(*) as cnt FROM loan_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy'), TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q'), TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm'), cred_mrtg_nm ORDER BY cred_mrtg_nm, base_ym

SELECT TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS base_ym, cust_dscd_nm, count(*) as cnt FROM loan_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy'), TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q'), TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm'), cust_dscd_nm ORDER BY cust_dscd_nm, base_ym

SELECT TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS base_ym, MAX(new_ln_amt) as max, ROUND(AVG(new_ln_amt), 0) as avg, ROUND(MEDIAN(NEW_LN_AMT), 0) AS mid FROM loan_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY base_ym

WITH new_loan_info AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS base_ym TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS base_ym TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS base_ym , new_ln_amt, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM ( SELECT * FROM loan_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') ,new_ln_amt )
SELECT base_ym, new_ln_amt AS mod FROM new_loan_info WHERE (base_ym, cnt) IN ( SELECT base_ym, MAX(cnt) FROM new_loan_info GROUP BY base_ym ) ORDER BY base_ym
